TextView.android:text: Note down the 'values before maintenance' in table-1 from front panel display of KHPA 1 & 2
Perform visual inspect: All connector plug, electrical wiring, waveguide, HV connectors are checked
Clean Air Filters: at the front of power supply drawer, RF drawer, at the blower outlet of KHPA 1, 2 & spare are cleaned
Inspect exhaust hose: Exhaust hose be inspected for any leakage
Perform external cleaning: front panel of KHPA 1,2 & spare KHPA are cleaned
Internal Cleaning: All transformers, inductors, coils and high voltage components of KHPA 1, 2 & Spare KHPA are cleaned.
Check all cooling Fans and Klystron collector blower:
Check the time in the KHPA 1, 2 & Spare KHPA is matched with GPS clock
KHPA 1 & 2 to be put in Transmit State.
KHPA 1 & 2 to be put in CIF mode.
Verify all the parameters of KHPA 1 & 2 from front panel display and note down 'Values After Maintenance' in Table 1.
[Below readings are applicable only if PNE is present otherwise NA]
Carried out PNE tuning as per SOP.
Note down the 5-digit Control Voltage Counter reading of PNE.
INLUS to be put in Primary mode in coordination with OMSS duty Officer.
Note down the 'values before maintenance' in table-2 from front panel display of ACU & tracking receiver
Check all the supply voltages, earth to neutral voltages in the drive cabinet.
Check the operation of two emergency switches at ADU.
Check the movement of AZ CW and CCW for both tracking and slew modes.
Check the movement of EL UP and DOWN for both tracking and slew modes.
Check the hardware and Software limits for EL UP/DOWN and AZ CW/CCW movements.
Carried out visual inspection of both 11m and 3m antenna, connectors of AZ & EL motor power supply, AZ and EL encoder, ADU Power supply, Data cable, L1 & L5 LNA RF & power supply
Carried out Greasing of AZ motor, EL motor, AZ ring gear & EL screw jack.
Check the time in the ACU is matched with GPS clock.
Put the Local/Remote toggle switch in ADU is in Remote.
ACU to be put in tracking mode.
Verify all the ACU and Tracking Receiver parameters from front panel display and note down 'Values After Maintenance' in Table 2.
INLUS to be put in Primary mode in coordination with OMSS duty Officer.
